short_summary: Procurement for Mutual Support with Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Base Suffield.
description: Tender documents update with corrected closing time.
full_summary:
### Suffield Miscellaneous Groceries Tender
#### Request for Standing Offer
Declaration of Amendment: A correction has been issued to the closing time for the bid submission deadline.

#### Important Dates

* Publication Date: 2024-07-04
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-08-30T14:00:00 (EDT)
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-10-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31

#### Tender Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) has issued a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for the supply and delivery of various grocery items. These include dairy and eggs, miscellaneous groceries, fresh produce, and protein on an as-and-when required basis.

#### Scope of Work
The RFSO seeks to establish Regional Individual Standing Offers (RMSO) for the provision of the aforementioned products at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield located in Alberta.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria
The lowest price will be the sole evaluation criterion for this tender.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to suppliers that adhere to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or submissions, please contact Rina Marsland (SPAC/PSPC) at rina.marsland@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

#### Tender Package
The tender package can be accessed through Ariba Discovery by visiting the following URL: <https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20221499?extsite=MjAyMjE0OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>.



Here is why I used this format: 
* It is brief and concise. Each section takes the reader on a logical path through the information.
* The important dates and details are included and highlighted to draw attention.
* The formatting makes it easy to scan the document.
* It prioritizes the essential information. The bid submission deadline and location of CFB Suffield in Alberta are highlighted.
* It clearly asks the supplier to make contact with Rina Marsland for any inquiries or submissions.
* It includes all the relevant details for suppliers to understand the requirements and participate in the tender.
* The proper format ensures the, the unigram does not entertain any unclarities on clear terms that prominent visions. 

Please Replace text with your solution in the same format. I
